title: Data is corupt

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Ive tried everything that this has told me to do and nothing has worked. So Im here to see if anything else will work.

replies.body: If you haven't tried this already grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a **reinstall and clean uninstall**. That should be able to get League running again, but let me know if it doesn't!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=MVEEgRxv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-05T22:06:27.260+0000)
>
> If you haven't tried this already grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a **reinstall and clean uninstall**. That should be able to get League running again, but let me know if it doesn't!

i tried using hextech repair tool and it fails everytime i try to reinstall or clean uninstall
you are running the repair tool in administrator mode right? cause it always fails if you dont

Hmmmmm you could try running a repair through the client options too by clicking the gear icon in the upper right, but if that doesn't work either go ahead and hit up our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to dig a lot more into what's happening than I can here on the boards.
